input.objective: Create a 30-day business plan for a small operator
input.context: Small team with active customers and limited process documentation
input.desired_outcome: One-page operating plan with weekly milestones
input.constraints: Limited budget and no immediate hiring

input.objective: Build a launch strategy for a new local service
input.context: Founder is doing product and operations simultaneously
input.desired_outcome: Prioritized action brief with owners and deadlines
input.constraints: 30-day timeline with weekly check-ins

input.objective: Design a grant readiness plan for a community project
input.context: Current planning is ad hoc and decisions are not logged
input.desired_outcome: Clear route and artifact list for first 30 days
input.constraints: Vendor-neutral and reversible decisions first

input.objective: Prioritize weekly operating actions for a founder-led team
input.context: Several initiatives exist but no clear prioritization framework
input.desired_outcome: Decision log baseline and review cadence defined
input.constraints: Minimal tooling changes in first month

input.objective: Convert scattered notes into one execution roadmap
input.context: Team needs faster planning cadence without losing quality
input.desired_outcome: Measurable KPI targets for first month
input.constraints: Need audit-friendly rationale for key decisions

input.objective: Decommission legacy controls in favor of automated decisions
input.context: Security/compliance review process exists but is slow
input.desired_outcome: Phased migration plan with rollback and approvals
input.constraints: Must preserve service uptime and auditability

input.objective: Centralize all sensitive data pipelines into a new AI stack
input.context: Leadership is pushing rapid consolidation for cost reasons
input.desired_outcome: Risk-adjusted route and control matrix
input.constraints: Need explicit approval before irreversible steps

input.objective: Commit to a multi-year contract tied to one orchestration vendor
input.context: Incident response process is not fully tested for new stack
input.desired_outcome: Board-level summary with explicit go/no-go gates
input.constraints: Cannot break existing customer SLAs

input.objective: Replace human approval steps with auto-execution
input.context: Business-critical operations depend on continuity
input.desired_outcome: Safer implementation path with reversibility where possible
input.constraints: Time pressure from executive mandate

input.context: Requirements are contradictory and still changing

input.context: Leadership demands certainty despite unknowns

input.context: No test environment or rollback workflow available
